Package de.maxhenkel.voicechat.api.packets

Interface EntitySoundPacket

All Superinterfaces:
ConvertablePacket, Packet, SoundPacket
public interface EntitySoundPacket extends SoundPacket
The receiver of this event will hear the sound from the specified entity. This can be done for all entities, but only players will show the speaker icon. If the entity is further away than the maximum voice distance, the receiving player won't actually hear the sound.
